text: ‘‘allahanu ilisi kottiruva sandesavannu nambiri’’ endu avarodane helidaga avaru, ‘‘allahanu namage ilisikottiruvudannu navu nambiddeve’’ ennuttare mattu adaracegiruva ellavannu avaru dhikkarisuttare – nijavagi idu avara bali iruvudannu samarthisuva satyave agide. ‘‘Nivu nijakku satyavannu nambuvavaragiddare, i hinde nivu allahana dutarugalannu kondaddeke?’’ Endu (avarodane) keliri
